parameters: Have an enemy Witch attack without a crit (Requires Airstrike Event).
Defeat a ballista with an archer (Requires Airstrike Event and Archer).
Defend your stronghold for 10 turns (Requires Airstike Event and Archer).
The enemy will receive ground and air reinforcements next turn.
